summary: Mara Lorbeer, a fifteen year old girl, finds out that she has to save the world because the Norse god Loki is threatening to break free of his chains.
cast: Lilian Prent|Jan Josef Liefers|Esther Schweins|Christoph Maria Herbst|Eva Habermann|Alex Simon|Carin C. Tietze|Joseph Hannesschläger|Leonie Tepe|Oliver Deissenböck|Moritz Fischer|Rudolf Simek|Sabine Lorenz|Nadine Wrietz|Norman Coester|Ivonne Braasch|John P. Nugent|Ina Meling|Sophie Adell|Nina Vorbrodt|Tina Nerger|Billy Boyd|Heino Ferch|Oliver Kalkofe|Thomas Fritsch|Rouven Blessing|Nino Kerl|Mira Sommer|Aurelien Torikian
title: Mara y el señor del fuego
